welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Sendai, Japan! Known for its stunning scenery, rich history, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Meiten Kaichi (仙台中華そば 銘店嘉一)
restaurants.description: Meiten Kaichi (仙台中華そば 銘店嘉一) is a ramen restaurant located in 仙台市.
restaurants.address: 青葉区国分町3-8-12, 仙台市, 宮城県, 980-0803

restaurants.name: Umami Tasuke (旨味 太助)
restaurants.description: Umami Tasuke (旨味 太助) is a japanese restaurant located in 仙台市.
restaurants.address: 青葉区国分町2-11-11 (千松島ビル 1F), 仙台市, 宮城県, 980-0803

restaurants.name: Aji Tasuke (味 太助 本店)

restaurants.address: 青葉区一番町4-4-13, 仙台市, 宮城県, 980-0811

restaurants.name: Kumagaiya (熊谷屋)
restaurants.description: Kumagaiya (熊谷屋) is a wagashi place located in 仙台市.
